strategy: Apply a random forest ensemble with bootstrap aggregation and introduce class-balanced sampling during training to reduce bias toward the majority class (survivors vs. non-survivors), while also incorporating categorical variables via one-hot encoding with target encoding for rare groups (e.g., specific deck combinations or passenger class and age groups).
